Description:
A 5-minute walk from the beach, Hotel Donny offers individually decorated accommodation with free Wi-Fi. All guests of Hotel Donny can use the 28 degrees-swimming pool, sauna and fitness free of charge.

The elegant rooms and suites all feature a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a minibar. The classic bathrooms are fitted with a bath or shower, a bathrobe and free toiletries are provided.

A freshly prepared breakfast is served daily in the breakfast area. It includes fresh rolls, fresh fruit, juice, coffee, tea and a variety of sweet and savoury spreads. The hotels restaurant, also named Donny, is open for lunch and dinner. They serve French dishes from the a la carte menu.

Hotel Donny also accommodates a wellness centre where guests can enjoy massages and a manicure or pedicure.

De Panne Esplanade Tram Stop is a 2-minute walk from Donny, from here it is a 10-minute tram ride to amusement park Plopsaland. Koksijde is a 7-minute drive, Oostend is a 35 minutes drive and Dunkerque is 25 minutes by car. Restaurant Donny is closed on Sunday.

Pets are allowed on request. Charges my apply. Please note that pets are not allowed in the wellness and the dining areas.

Hotel Maxim is situated in the heart of De Panne in a quiet neighbourhood and has a seventies look&feel. The beach is only 300 metres away and you can easily walk to the city centre. Free Wifi is featured throughout the entire property.

The hotel offers renovated rooms with a private bathroom with a bath. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace to sit outside.

Breakfast is served in buffet style with several rolls and bread kinds. Start the day with cereals, yoghurt, fruit salad, and several tasty spreads. Boiled eggs are available.

The hotel bar is worth a visit when you feel like having a drink. During the summer, there is a possibility to enjoy your drink in the garden.

A variety of restaurants are situated around the hotel that can provide a tasty evening dinner. Restaurant Cajou, near the hotel, offers excellent fish, crayfish and grill specialities.

The Ambassador Hotel is a stylish hotel in De Panne. Start off your day with an extensive breakfast buffet and stroll down to the beach, just 50 metres away.

The hotel rooms are modern in style and have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The homey and cosy atmosphere in each room will make you feel at ease and peaceful.
